text: Haut-Valromey is a new commune in the Ain department of eastern France, in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region. The municipality was incorporated on January 1, 2016 and consists of the former communes of Hotonnes, Le Grand-Abergement, Le Petit-Abergement and Songieu.Arrêté préfectoral 29 September 2015 It is the largest commune of the Ain department. ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== Category:2016 establishments in France
title: Haut-Valromey
